articles.title: Here's what to know about GOP claims of a Biden scandal | CNN Politics
articles.description: Defenders of former President Donald Trump have responded to news of his indictment by the US Department of Justice with deflection: Why is Trump being charged but not President Joe Biden’s son Hunter?
